SEARCH
Module LabAssignment
Package entity

Class CompanyRep

java.lang.Object
entity.User
entity.CompanyRep
public class CompanyRep extends User
Represents a Company Representative user. This user is responsible for creating and managing internship listings for their specific company. They utilize a specific CompanyRepFilter to restrict their view to their own company's data.

  • Constructor Details

    • CompanyRep

      public CompanyRep(String userId, String name, String password, String company, String department, String position)
      Constructs a new Company Representative. Initializes the user as unapproved and unauthorized by default, and assigns a CompanyRepFilter to ensure they only see their own company's internships.
      Parameters:
      userId - The unique user ID (email).
      name - The full name of the representative.
      password - The login password.
      company - The name of the company the representative belongs to.
      department - The department within the company.
      position - The job title/position of the representative.

  • Method Details

    • isApproved

      public boolean isApproved()
      Checks if the representative's account creation has been approved by Career Center Staff.
      Returns:
      true if approved, false otherwise.

    • approveByCCS

      public void approveByCCS()
      Marks the representative as approved. This is typically called by a Career Center Staff member.

    • getCompany

      public String getCompany()
      Retrieves the company name.
      Returns:
      The company name.

    • getDepartment

      public String getDepartment()
      Retrieves the department name.
      Returns:
      The department.

    • getPosition

      public String getPosition()
      Retrieves the job title/position.
      Returns:
      The position.

    • isAuthorized

      public boolean isAuthorized()
      Checks if the user is currently authorized to access the system (e.g., login allowed).
      Returns:
      true if authorized.

    • getNumberOfInternships

      public int getNumberOfInternships()
      Retrieves the current number of internships posted by this representative. Used to enforce the posting quota (typically max 5).
      Returns:
      The count of internships.

    • incrementInternships

      public void incrementInternships()
      Increments the count of internships posted.

    • decrementInternships

      public void decrementInternships()
      Decrements the count of internships posted. Used when an internship is deleted.

    • setAuthorized

      public void setAuthorized(boolean authorized)
      Sets the authorization status of the representative.
      Parameters:
      authorized - true to grant access, false to revoke.
